properties.areaDesc: Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; Northern Elko County
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 15 at 2:06PM PST until February 16 at 6:00PM PST by NWS Elko NV
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3-5 inches
expected for the valleys. The mountains can see snowfall of 6-
12 inches with some locally higher spots. Winds gusting as
high as 35 mph.

* WHERE...Northern Elko County and Ruby Mountains/East Humboldt
Range.

* WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 6 PM PST Sunday.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Travel could be very difficult. Gusty
winds could bring down tree branches.
properties.instruction:
A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will
cause primarily travel difficulties. Expect snow covered roads
and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 PM PST SUNDAY
